post.body: @trapprmarkelz just remember... Drinking and Frostmourne do not mix... Send it to me for safe keeping!
must be nice to know yu can "nelson" a site that has nothing to do with the xbox lol you must weild this power carefully =P
no it's not... thats how you end up with stuff like betpad.com =P
I will NEVER adapt to digital only music =P plus when you've had multiple HDDs fail through the years with no backup... CDs = win
didn't realize that Raptr had a twitter capabilities as well...
score! hah, actually I need to work on my website, been defunct for almost a year, wouldn't look good to go job hunting with it
Only if I could do a text based game, I hate art... takes me 2+ hours to come up with something for our website if from scratch
at least it should keep you awake that way... empty office, no projects on my side... zzzzz
: It was that "who's your daddy" drink!
SWEET! Always up for a new quiz!
haha, it's cool, I went to inform Customer Service and was like "wait a sec..."
Was that BrightKit lagging? Those were cancellations for the 27th/28th...
Guitar Hero Metallica and Brutal Legend, yeah I'm metal like that =P
Thats because FLCL is teh awesome!
thats been me on all except 2 days a week for the past month, kinda rules, but kinda sucks
only person that messed up my SPs could be my boss... so thankfully I'm never put in that position =P
Rule 1: Its always the new guy
run away from this sucky state while you can, before it's suckiness traps you forever in a mire of sucking suck... suck
yet we have thunderstorms in Ohio... hrm...
just started playing Zoids Assault. http://raptr.com/Cormyre
I've been in a Tool mood for the past week or so... it's a shame I don't know where my CDs are...
played Zoids Assault on Xbox (1 achievement, 100G) http://gamerdna.com/r/1DK
holy crap my dept is cold... 65 is feeling cold for whatever reason... odd
Great news! Looks like Ohio will have a 2009 racing season after all, Ohio horsemen struck a deal about ADW revenue last evening.
can't believe I've been here 3 hours already, with another 7 to go (7?!) and it's looking like another day of being alone in the office =P
Wow @ the X-Blades CE, great CE packaging may make up for a game that will probably suck, anime girlie statue included... may have to buy =p
should have worn skates into work today... nice sheet of ice on all sidewalks... dreaded every driveway I had to cross...
Pondering eating one of the cats... Not sure ID miss one
played Zoids Assault on Xbox http://gamerdna.com/r/1BL
